inn1.comm: right on target just outside off with some away movement, pushed towards covers

that looks straight, that looks mighty close, Gambhir rapped on the pad in front of middle stump as he was caught on the crease, that looked gone, not given, replays show the ball pitched just outside leg stump, oh well, you know now who can never be an umpire
length ball pushed towards extra cover, and Gautam is away
the inward shape into Sachin makes him push outside the line, the ball takes a bit of an inside edge to pop up on the off side off the pad flap
gets across and behind the line of this back of a length ball and blocks
lovely delivery, he usually  bends it in to the right hander, this one moves away from short of a length outside off, Sachin walks across and gets beaten as he has a poke at it
decent length ball to start with, defended on the off side
dribbles off the pad behind square leg as he gets on his toes to try and tuck the short of a length ball that jags in
pushes a length ball down the track, Lakmal fields, Sachin was playing quite a distance away from the body
gets across, covers the line of off and allows this skiddy one just outside off to go past
some away shape now for Lakmal, Sachin leaves it alone again
good lines from Lakmal, bowls it in to Sachin with the angle and gets it to straighten a foot outside off, Sachin shoulders arms
reaches forward and pushes it back to the bowler off the toe end of the bat
on to the pads this time, and Gautam tucks it through square leg crisply, a mess is made of the stop close to the rope as the fielder running across slips, and allows them to take three
front foot moves forward and across solidly as he pushes a straightish length ball to covers
similar stroke, on to the front foot again and a firm push to covers
holds its line outside off stump, but Sachin deals with it superbly, opens the face very late to time it past point, this outfield is so fast that even a dive from the chasing fielder it not enough
just a hint of coming in from a good length, ending around off, he comes well forward and blocks
inward shape but it started on the pads and moved down the leg side, Sanga could not collect it cleanly, Gautam thought there was the chance to sneak in a bye, Sachin sends him back
flicked off the pad down to fine leg
he is getting forward and across each time, plays out this length delivery towards mid on
hit on the pads, Lakmal turns around and starts to appeal before grimacing, there was an inside edge on to pad as Sachin missed the work towards midwicket
plays straighter now, pushes a 140 kph pitched up delivery down to the man at mid on
a high full toss now, Sachin pushes it, in the air for a while, to mid off
that came back in late from a fullish length, but was dealt with well, as it was turned with the movement to square leg
bat in front of pad as he pushes the pitched up delivery to mid on and holds the defensive pose for a while
whoa, has a go at this one angled across him and misses it completely
superb straight drive from Gautam, too straight in fact, as it shatters Sachin's stumps at the other end
pitched up again and he eases into another drive, this time he goes between the bowler and mid on, both didn't have a chance
defends a slower length ball tightly
worked in front of square leg off the pad
Lakmal is getting it to shape in from a full length, Sachin's drive goes off the inner part of the bat through square leg
pushed away to mid on

oh well, Sachin has succumbed to the high full toss, the second one that Lakmal has bowled, he has pushed it low to short extra cover, who has immediately claimed the catch, Mahela it is, the ball looked close to have been waist-high, but then it dipped on Sachin and was well within limits as he played the stroke, does not seem to be any issue with the catch as well, Mahela pouched it low with both hands, Sachin has to walk back after the third umpire rules out all possibilities that could have extended his stay
that inward movement again, Virat checks his stroke, and gets it off the inside part  of the bat to fine leg
lets a widish one angled across him go past
smack! Gautam has carved the overpitched delivery past cover, superb timing, bent his knee, reached out to the pitch and sent it on its way
head on top of the ball, front foot coming well forward, Virat defends with a straight bat
pushes a length ball to point
plays out one that comes off slowly off the pitch, towards midwicket
that wide delivery has been clobbered, but the off side infield is packed with fielders, and shortish cover-point fields the ball
Virat gets the single now, pushes into the gap to the left of mid off and is home even as the throw misses
motions forward and smothers this pitched up straight one towards midwicket
looks to drive down the ground but ends up hitting it straight to mid on
rides the bounce on this back of a length ball and plays it to point
allows the length ball to come on with the angle into him and works it behind square leg, fine leg cuts it off
already on the front foot is Virat, and adjusts to push the back of a length ball to the bowler
superb delivery handled well by Virat, Lakmal sends it screaming in the blockhole, Virat calmly turns it to short midwicket
the third full toss that he has bowled, this one is not high, it is on the pads as well, Virat has an easy four as he tucks it through square leg
gets bat around front pad to turn this one from middle on to the leg side

slowish one pitched up wide across the left-hander, Gautam reaches out and times it past short extra cover, Kapugedara on the edge of the circle gets some extra bounce off the practice pitches and misfields to allow a single
dabs this one down to third man for one
this outfield is really fast but that does not take anything away from how well Gautam has timed this length ball past midwicket
turned past mid on for a single
dropped in front of mid on softly for another single
good diving stop by mid off to his left saves a certain boundary, Virat's timing on this push was so good that the ball had gathered a lot of pace as it started to race past mid off
dabbed away on the off side
reaches out to a widish full delivery but drives it straight to short extra cover

Gautam makes up his mind and crashes the pitched up delivery between those two men, but Kapu is around to stop the four with a dash to his right at extra cover, Virat was halfway up the crease and would have been gone had the throw hit
eased down to third man for one
well done, allows this one to come in, leans on the front foot and tucks it past square leg
comes slowly off the pitch, he makes room and punches to extra cover
lunges forward and defends to extra cover
uses his feet, gets to the pitch and pushes it past Dilshan to long off
turned to square leg with the spin
makes room and punches down to long off
cannot push the full delivery past cover
skiddy one staying low on to the pad, worked to fine leg
goes across Gautam from a length, he backs away to guide it to sweeper cover
another one on Virat's pads, worked to deep square
hurries on towards middle and off, he gets bat down quickly to push it on the leg side
straightish one, he shuffles and turns in front of square leg
just going straight with the angle into Virat's pads, no turn at all, worked for a single square on the leg side
gets forward and flicks with the spin to deep square
makes some room eagerly, but mistimes the cut into the ground
motions forward and smothers the fullish one to Dilshan
worked away square and by the time fine leg gets around to it, they have run two
quickish flat one cut away to cover-point
cannot time the punch this time, away to short extra cover
smacked straight to Dilshan at extra cover
makes some room and pushes this one off middle to extra cover again
brings out his big drive, reaches out to a wide and full one but finds that man Dilshan again
there is no Dilshan on the leg side, and Virat will earn a single with a work through square
chops the cut to point, the ball was quick and too close for the stroke
comes forward and works this one from outside off down to fine leg
this one hurried in with the angle towards leg stump, Gautam was backing away and adjusted to push it away
some width was there, but there was not much power in Gautam's cut
he didn;t need any power at all this time, he just reached forward a a long way, and scooped the full delivery over dilshan and into the straight boundary
cut hard down to sweeper cover
whip-driven down to long off for one more
meets the fullish one early with a straight bat and earns one to long off
a dab, that dab, from Gautam gets him a single to third man
works a length delivery with the angle to deep midwicket
gets across and tucks a back of a length ball off the hip but cannot beat short fine leg, missed out there
inside edge rolls onto the pitch as Virat looks to defend
lots of width, a cracking drive from Virat results, sweeper cover is in place
walks out and tries to look for a single but square leg makes him go back
gets inside the line and pushes a tossed up ball down to wide long off
neat diving stop from midwicket saves the single

dropped by Chandimal at long on, Gautam had chipped this one in the air, Chandimal did not have a long distance to cover to his left, got both hands to the ball as he dived in front, but it popped out as he touched the ground
shortish ball, he bashes the pull away to deep midwicket
hit hard, along the ground this time, to long on
sharp single wide of extra cover, superb running
drives a pitched up delivery straight to mid off
works a decent length ball wristily square on the leg side
opens the face and runs a back of a length ball to third man
pushes a bouncing slower one back to the bowler
pushed towards cover-point
fine stop from extra cover who moves quickly down to his right to stop Virat's firm push
gets away with a low full toss angled across Gautam, who drives it to short extra cover
well done, he walks down the pitch, Kula drops the length short, Gautam waits on it and carves it past point, no chance for the man in the deep
full delivery squeezed out to sweeper cover
they have found the fielders a lot with crisp strokes today, Virat does so again, extra cover is the fielder this time
bunted in front of square leg for a sharp single
runs this one behind point

on to the pads and they take a couple of runs with a comfortable tuck behind square leg, they decide to check with the third umpire as the throw comes in, Gautam's bat has almost reached the stumps, comfortably in
another good scrambling stop, mid off runs to his left and tumbles to keep a solid push to one
a rare miss, Virat's wrists will the length delivery to midwicket's right, and the fielder cannot stop it cleanly
stabs at this back of a length ball and gets it down to third man
it held its line around off stump, but Virat's wrists had already taken over and he gets another run square on the leg side, productive scoring area for him that
and now Gautam gets to his fifty with a tuck off his pads, lots of cheers from the crowd
another work to deep square leg for yet another single
pushed back to the bowler
sliding down the pads from around the stumps and helped down to fine leg
Virat sees the flight, and gives it the eager whip-drive, only a single to sweeper cover
that stayed a shade low as it hurried towards middle, Gautam makes room and punches to sweeper cover
eases the tossed up ball down to wide long off
for once, for once, Virat misses the work on the leg side, and is hit high on the pad, what a rare moment
Maharoof is getting the ball to move in late this over, Virat was playing the original line as he looked to push on the off side, it took the inside edge onto thigh pad and rolled towards Sanga
that movement makes Virat's forward stride and push slightly tentative as he plays it towards extra cover
this time he has the shortish length to whip from well outside off in front of square leg
pushed towards sweeper cover
he risks the single with a soft push in front of mid on, direct hit needed, not happening, Virat makes it
backs away and smacks this shortish one to deep midwicket
angled full in to the pads, trickles behind square, Sanga goes after it
slightly short, and outside off, Virat immediately goes back to cut, sweeper cover gets to it
again towards Gautam's pads, he gets the bat in front and nudges to fine leg
pushed down to long off
punched down to sweeper cover for a single
tucked through square leg
straightish line, but back of a length, and he gets around to it and whips it to deep square
lots of bounce, tight line, but gautam handles it very well, and with calm, opens the face late to run it to third man
wanted to work for more runs on the leg side but this was slower than usual from Maharoof and rolled away off the pad
solid push, as the loud 'crack' sound tells us, down to long off
boundary for Gautam, over one of his favourite areas, extra cover, gets under the good length delivery and lofts it cleanly
slapped down to long off, he was looking to go through extra cover
risk-free, easy single down to long off with a push
plays with the spin, earns one to fine leg
guides for a single to sweeper cover
pushed back to the bowler
stabbed in the air, and on the bounce to a diving Dilshan
another single to sweeper cover with an open-faced bat
slaps a fullish skiddy delivery to sweeper cover again, what would ODI cricket be without that position?
nudged behind square leg
another run through the off side
works this one straight to midwicket
brings bat in front of pad and a nudge, a simple no-fuss nudge, placed right, behind square, gets him two, and brings up the 100 of the stand
so much time to play off the wicket, makes some room and punches through cover for one more
squeezes the full delivery down the ground, waits till it has passed Dilshan, and then trots across
Virat continues to thread the leg side with singles, singles and more of them
squeezed out to short extra cover
flatter one, punched away to you-know-who, the one who normally guides the square off side boundary
well played, opens the face, and dabs it late to the third man boundary
stroked hard but straight to the bowler
turned to square leg off the pad
appeal for leg before, Gautam misses the paddle and is struck on the pad, looked to be turning down leg
smashed hard, really hard, but sweeper cover has the ability to treat everything the same, all is worth only one
Virat Kohli, India vice-captain, another fifty on the CV, with a tuck square on the leg side
eased down the ground
some width outside off, and Gautam turns that into a single to sweeper cover with a punch
driven to midwicket
whip-driven, straight to wide long off
down to sweeper cover for another single
uses the spin to work it to long on
hit down to long off, nothing happening, unless singles are your source of excitement
no, no, that is too early, Veer, here we have another single, long-on in business this time
reaches out and pushes to extra cover
slides down the leg side, skiddy and flat
pushed away to extra cover
the direction was extra cover again, but the fielder had zero chance of stopping this one, as Virat whip-lofted way over him, and into the boundary
squeezes a tossed up full one on middle and leg, back to the bowler
innocuous, length ball sitting up around off, punched to you-know-who
whoa, oh boy, that is some stroke, Virat sees this one on a fullish length outside off, he plonks front foot out, and plays a furious reverse swipe, in contempt, four all the way to third man
now he goes down for the conventional sweep to fine leg
eased down to long off
pushes the tossed up ball to Dilshan
slowly spinning on to Virat's pad, he slowly nudges it wide of fine leg, but is not slow as he hares back for two
widish skiddy delivery outside off, dabbed wide of backward point
opens up and pushes this one on middle, to midwicket
full ball scooped back to the bowler
for an instant, looked as if he would charge out, but then he waited back and and slapped it wide of sweeper cover, who could not prevent the second this time
down the track, has enough momentum to drive the ball past the bowler and down to long on
some bounce for Dilshan, but on leg stump, and a nudge is enough for a single
slapped past the man at extra cover for a couple
punched down to long on for one
kept low a shade, carved out to sweeper cover
leans into the drive, but Mahela gets in the way at extra cover, with a dive to his left
pushed back to the bowler
helped wide of fine leg
pushed solidly back to the bowler
cut hard to sweeper cover, superb running as they come back for two
tossed up ball eased to long off
lot of time for Gautam to go back and whip past midwicket
flighted delivery defended off the front foot
dabbed down to third man
pushed back to the bowler
gentle length ball scooped in the air, but falls short of midwicket
smashed past the non-striker to long on
offcutter pushed to long off
makes use of the full toss, times the push past extra cover and into the boundary
slower one to start off, he drops it softly but won't get the single
this time he makes some room and dabs the slower one behind square on the off side
he is bowling slower ones at the moment, Kohli cannot this one away as he drops it towards mid on
inswinging yorker zooms in, but he is in such good form that he squeezes it out towards midwicket and manages a run
allows the back of a length ball to come on and dabs it to third man
down the track as he backs away outside leg but Maharoof is on target with an inswinging full delivery that Kohli can only pat towards midwicket, top over
would have been wide had Gautam not reached out and slapped the high full toss past point, Lakmal has sent down a few of those today
goes through mid on, another full toss, not high, though, but towards the pads, Virat whips it to Kula's right at mid on, and he cannot stop the ball with a tumble
another wayward one this over from Lakmal, full and wide down leg
hits the blockhole this time around off stump, and Virat cannot force it away
one more full toss, Lakmal has bowled too many of them, they might as well have played Malinga, Virat's drive is stopped by a diving mid off to his left
squeezes a very full one past extra cover
slower one gone wrong down the leg side, bounces in front of Sanga, gives him a hard time, India scamper a bye
length ball punched to Mahela at midwicket
down the track and drills a full delivery hard and straight to mid off, it bursts through his hands, Sri Lanka have slipped in the field in recent overs
nudged behind square leg
there is a direct hit at the non-striker's but Virat is already home, he was off as soon as he punched towards mid off
fine leg is up, Maharoof's line is down the pads, and Gautam has got enough on it to beat the fielder
shuffles across and does not time the nudge on the leg side
low dipping full toss, Gautam gets it past Virat off the toe end of the bat, mid off tidies up
wanted to hammer this one over midwicket, but it shaped in to take an inside edge into pad
Lakmal gets the inswinging yorker right, it tails in towards middle, Virat misses with the swing
full delivery guided to sweeper cover
low full toss, Virat uses the pace to turn it through midwicket, man in the deep runs to his left to stop the ball
another one tails in from outside off, full in the blockhole, Virat does very well to open the face and guide it wide of third man
slower one, so slow that Gautam has time to walk out, stop, open up, look towards the leg side, change his option, and in the end, dab it on the off side
very full and very wide, Virat has to stretch to reach it as he stabs it past point
another wide one, this time he smokes it off the front foot wide of Dilshan at sweeper cover
another low full toss, flicked to deep square
full and wide outside off is the way to go at the moment, Virat again reaches out, carves it in the air to sweeper cover
short and rising outside off to Gautam, who rides the bounce and drops it towards backward point
pushes a bouncing length ball down to long off

Gautam has survived, he was gone by a mile and three had that throw hit, a soft drop to short extra cover and Gautam is away, but there was no run, and he had no time to get back, the throw is into the ground, bounces and misses the stumps
calmness returns, the line helps, off the pads to deep square
holding its line outside off stump, pushed with an open face past point
squeezes a full delivery to covers, Sri Lanka are doing a mighty fine job at the moment
that helps, that certainly helps Gautam, a high full toss, he has launched that, he has lifted that in front of square leg, one short of 100 now
cannot get the run, Gautam was eager to get to the other end, but Virat sent him back as the ball rolled away off the pad
Virat gets there first, with a push to a length ball past the bowler on the off side, half an embrace from Gautam as Virat soaks in the cheers, celebrates his tenth ODI hundred with a leap or two
Gautam cannot get his single, he squeezes a full delivery on the off side, but the bowler gets there quickly, Gautam has to go back
hundred after quite some time for Gautam, pulls a short ball through square leg, punches the air hard, tenth one for him as well
slapped with lots of intent, runs down to third man

Sanga appealed for caught behind, he kept on appealing, he even added 'howzzat' in the end. but to no avail, he looks stunned, Gautam had missed the pull off a pretty handy bouncer, and Sanga had gone tumbling for the take
oh, another full toss, Virat reaches out, a hand comes off the bat, but the ball has disappeared over extra cover after a violent thwack
pushes a slower one towards covers

Gautam has launched another one in the direction of long on, there is no Chandimal there this time, there is Tharanga, and he takes an excellent catch in the end, tumbling forward to his left, Gautam had made up his mind to go for it after his ton, he set himself up to swing this full one over midwicket, got nowhere close to timing it
well run, drops a slower one in the region of long on and they will come back for the second
and both men got their hundreds in the same over, and both men perished in the next, Virat wanted to carve this one over extra cover but he ended up finding sweeper cover
pushes a pitched up ball to extra cover
stays back to a length ball and slaps it to extra cover
slaps it again but this time he gets it to long off
Raina swings big, he has no choice, he goes down the track and hammers Prasanna straight down the ground, long on was in the frame, but he had no chance
again he leaves the crease and hits down to long off
Dhoni backs away looking for the cut but finds extra cover again
squeezes a very full ball towards covers
stays in the crease and runs a length ball to third man
swinging into the blockhole outside off, Dhoni tries to heave it away with force, but cannot get much in it past covers
Raina pulls from outside off stump to deep square
that is neatly done, Dhoni has got his front leg out of the way of this yorker, and got enough bat on it to beat short fine leg, Lakmal cannot believe it
another one close to the blockhole, Dhoni stays back and near-helicopters it with a big followthrough along the ground to long on
now he lets a widish length ball go past him outside off, hmm
and now he gives this length delivery everything, with a massive swing of the bat, but cannot connect
he connects now, not as well as he would have liked, the full delivery rolls away to midwicket
a single to deep midwicket is all that Raina will get as Sri Lanka continue to find the full length
slants it away from Dhoni, but this time it is too wide outside off
ho ho, Dhoni has slaughtered this length ball, he wound up and swung hard at it, bit of a top edge, but the ball disappears into the crowd beyond deep midwicket from well outside off stump
driven to sweeper cover
wide full toss outside off, Dhoni reaches out and spears it to sweeper cover
drives off the front foot, gets it down to squarish third man
Dhoni tries to get under this full delivery and helicopter it over midwicket, but he manages only one along the ground to midwicket
Raina gets four for India, pitched up delivery, he hammers it as straight as possible, between Dhoni and his stumps
another four, Raina goes extra cover now, bends the knee, gets to the line of the widish delivery and lifts it over extra cover
this one was in his slot, full toss speared in towards middle and leg, but he finds deep square
saves a certain four, Maharoof gets down to his left quickly at short fine as Raina tickles one off his pad
swung straight past the bowler, long off and long on converge, long off reaches the ball first with a dive

whoa, Dhoni goes off side with the helicopter, both his legs are in the air as he goes through with the swing, long off could have stopped that on the bounce, but he has over-run the ball, it slips past him to his right
thick outside edge flies down to third man as Dhoni has another heave outside off
another boundary, Dhoni has suddenly come alive, gets one on the pads and wrists it past short fine leg
high full toss, outside off, Dhoni prepares himself and clobbers it past midwicket, long on gives  up early, he could have given up earlier
low full toss wide outside off, squeezed out to sweeper cover
yet another full toss, swinging in towards the pads, Dhoni's front leg makes way as he picks up two more through square leg
full tosses and more full tosses, Dhoni bends the back leg scoops it behind square leg, Mahela grimaces
gets the yorker in for once, Dhoni digs it out towards mid on
one more low full toss, eased out to long off
full toss gain, on the pads, no worries for Dhoni, shuffles, takes four more to fine leg
Dhoni back on strike as Raina digs out a yorker on the off side
full toss, wide outside off, safer zone that, Dhoni stretches out and finds sweeper cover
flicked to deep square leg
wide, too wide outside off
play and a miss outside off, Dhoni ends up swinging inside the line of this full delivery
much better over this, another full delivery, clobbered down to long on
full toss on middle, fitting end to the innings, Raina leans over and swings at it, it has carried all the way over deep midwicket, incredible

inn2.comm: straightening on off from a good length, defended
some bounce now even as it holds its line, Mahela was coming forward, and drops it onto the pitch
swinging in again, but on to the pads, and Mahela picks up the first boundary of the innings to the fine leg boundary, there is no one there
better line outside off, Mahela mistimes the drive, Raina comes to his right to field at extra cover
bit of shape into the right-hander, solidly defended off the front foot
Mahela tries to charge out, but gets into a tangle as Irfan spears it in to the blockhole
PK gets it to shape away first up, from a good length outside off, Dilshan lets it go
clobber! Dilshan hits the gap between cover and point as he slaps one that offers him some width
worked behind square leg from middle
ending on middle from a length, Mahela eases it calmly and elegantly through square leg, the outfield does the rest
could have punished the similar line again, but this time his clip finds square leg
hit on the thigh pad as this one nips in from back of a length
holy moly, Mahela tees off over square leg, all the way into the stands, picks it up from a good length and lifts it with the inswing
into Mahela with the changed angle, a firm clip finds the fielder at square leg
carries with the angle across Dilshan who shoulders arms late
Irfan hits 136 kph, but Dilshan crashes that length ball with disdain, but straight to extra cover
he tried to flick him over fine leg off the pad, but ended up scooping it in the air, falls short of Dhoni and the slip
blocked solidly down the track
Mahela, another pleasing stroke, makes a violent cut look beautiful, lots of width outside off, he delays his shot for an instant and slams it past point
opened up a tad as he defends a length ball on the off side
nothing elegant about this one from Mahela, he's lucky instead, he gives PK the charge, and goes through with a slog, inside edge misses leg stump by inches
so Mahels stays in the crease and runs it behind point
tucked behind square leg
Irfan has struck, off a poor delivery, but he's sent Dilshan back, who's lined up the pull to this long hop but found Virat at midwicket
Rohit dives onto the practice pitch at midwicket, saves a run
punched solidly straight to extra cover
slightly fuller in length, defended tightly
pushed towards covers
length ball pushed away on the off side
defended off the back foot
back of a length and moving away slightly, Mahela gets across and blocks, steady line from PK, working well at the moment
whoa, Mahela releases the pressure in style, he goes down and scoops PK from around off stump, all the way over the fine leg rope, was that timed or what
more runs, superb batting from Mahela, nothing wrong with the delivery, maybe it offered some width outside off, Mahela gets across, hangs back and dabs it late, it races to the third man boundary
pushed to cover from the crease
shaping away a tad from the left-hander, who punches it on the off side
oh, this one has come in to Sanga, who was not expecting that, ended up flailing outside the line, that wasn't far from off
away with a work square on the leg side
good line from Irfan, ending around off, some nip off the wicket, Mahela is solid in defence
opens the face and earns a single to third man
Sanga is uncertain at the moment outside off, this length ball from Irfan moved away and Sanga reached out to under-edge it
good start, fullish length around middle, at 126.3 kph, Mahela pushes towards midwicket
some bounce from back of a length for Vinay, straight outside off, Mahela runs it to third man
steady so far from Vinay, Sanga pushes a length ball on the off side
punched to mid off for a quick single
dug in short, too short, Mahela lets it go over him
moves away from Mahela from a length, he pushes it between cover and point, who gets a hand to it and takes all the pace off it
pushed to extra cover from the crease
slam! Sanga gets going with a walk down the pitch, and smashes Irfan's length ball past mid off
tries to force it through the off side but mistimes it to extra cover
turned towards midwicket with the angle
shuffles across and works with the angle to fine leg
pushed back to the bowler, Sanga is trying hard to get some runs, he is not timing them at the moment
was short and wide for the pull, but Sanga does not get hold of it well enough, hits it to mid on, who misfields and allows one
had PK managed a better pick-up, Sanga would have been tested as he punched to mid off and set off for the run
good short ball, Mahela swivels and hooks, Jadeja misfields now at deep square leg
flicked in the air to deep square
superb work from Rohit at short extra cover, he is on the practice pitches, but he throws himself to his right to get a hand to a drive that would otherwise have clattered into the boundary
oh, classy from Mahela, no stopping this one, gets forward and drives the length delivery, through the gap past extra cover
guided wide of point
some turn outside off, pushed wide of cover
shouts of 'catch it', but Sanga has left nothing to chance, he comes down the track right away and lofts with the turn cleanly over deep midwicket
now they push the fielder, and take two, Ashwin is not quick enough running in from long on
defended down the track
skips down the pitch and pushes for a single to long on
pushes a full delivery to the bowler
pushed to the bowler
punched for a single to long off
confusion as Mahela wants two after working it through square leg, Sanga sends him back after he has completed half the run
easily done, pushed past the bowler to long off
turned in the air but falls short of midwicket
nudged wide of short fine leg with the turn
defended off the front foot
there comes the Mahela loft over extra cover, makes some room, and goes with the spin in the gap between extra cover and cover, that is also Mahela's fifty
pushed down to long on for a single
tossed up ball pushed to wide long off
defended calmly back to the bowler
Raina is bowling from around the stumps, and Mahela uses the line going down his pads to sweep past short fine leg
another four, Raina pushes it through flat and quick outside off, Mahela waits, he makes some room and cuts past point, lovely
nudged square for one
Sanga continues to get the single down the ground, Mahela back on strike
cannot get it past square leg with the nudge
works behind square leg for a single
backs away and runs it from off to short third man
Sanga wants to have a go at Jadeja again, but he inside edges the swing on to his pad
leaves the crease again, and this time clips through midwicket
strokes this one wide of sweeper cover, 100 is up, Sri Lanka are right in this one
couple of runs through midwicket
pushes with a straight bat to the bowler
pushed back to the left of the bowler who does well to stop it with a dive
misses the sweep as this one heads down leg
full delivery on leg, turned in front of square
they think about a single initially towards point before Sanga settles it with a loud NO
hit down to long on
defends a tossed up ball off the front foot
drives a straightish length delivery to PK at sweeper cover
pitched up delivery driven down to mid off for a single
Mahela wants to make the Powerplay count, he charges out, but does not get hold of this length delivery at all, is cramped for room and ends up swatting it towards midwicket
punchy drive, past extra cover
reaches out and places it wide of third man
flashes at a pitched up ball angled across him, it flies off a thick edge to third man
that stayed  a shade low and Sanga ended up chopping the cut to extra cover
down leg is the line, and Sanga changes ends with a nudge to short fine
shot! here comes Mahela, down the pitch to the flighted one outside off and hammers it with the spin over midwicket
good length delivery spinning in and he softly pushes it to long on
clipped nicely to deep midwicket
again on the pads, helped to fine leg
stretches out and slaps a very wide one down to third man
into the pads with the angle and Sanga picks up one to fine leg

Mahela's dab has consume him this time, Irfan has struck again, he angled it across Mahela, widish delivery, moving away from the right-hander, Mahela tried to run it to third man but ended up guiding it to Dhoni's right, the keeper goes low to snap up the offering, it was lovely while it lasted, but Mahela is gone now
defended solidly off the front foot
punched firmly to cover
well bowled, tossed up and defended off a thick edge to cover
punched to point
full delivery pushed back to the bowler
gets the flighted delivery down to long off for a single
fullish on middle, turned straight to midwicket, pressure increases after this tight over
and is met with a solid push to long off
some width on offer, but Chandimal mistimes it to point as he goes too hard at the shot
comes back in sharply off the pitch, Chandimal manages to nudge it through square leg

Rohit has fielded superbly today, and now he has scored a direct hit too from midwicket, got quickly to the ball, and let it rip on the run, Chandimal has just managed to make his ground after initially setting for a single
pitched up delivery quietly played out to midwicket
pushed to extra cover
gets bat in front of pad to defend
superb delivery, Sanga could do nothing about it, tossed up, pitching middle, and turning past the outside edge, they appeal for caught behind but there was not edge
slapped away to sweeper cover
dabbed towards point
pushes a flighted delivery to extra cover
Sanga guides this one towards covers and takes a few steps out, Chandimal is already half way up the pitch before Sanga sends him back
plays out a pitched up delivery on middle to midwicket
that will go, Chandimal stays in the crease, makes a bit of room and strokes the length ball past point, super timing
he wants a run every ball, and again has to rush back as the fielder closes in from cover
drives, but without much power, to midwicket
gets the drive down to long on now
drives through extra cover for a couple
carrom ball from Ashwin, dropped softly towards point
turn for Ashwin again, Sanga wanted to shuffle and work it on the leg side but could not do much with it
eased away to sweeper cover now
flighted delivery dips outside off, defended towards cover
they will need more of this, Chandimal uses his feet, gets to the pitch and force for a single to long on
driven down to long on for another single
pushed back to the bowler
fetches it from well outside off and laps it behind square leg
that has been smacked, Sanga picks this one from even further outside off stump and cracks it in front of square leg
gets to his fifty with a clip through midwicket
nudged in front of square leg
down the leg side
pushed through cover
pushes with the spin towards extra cover

Ashwin strikes, Chandimal perishes with a charge and a miss, it was the carrom ball, Chandimal sees the flight and comes out, ends up swinging inside the line, the ball holds its line and strikes middle, he has superb control over this delivery
tossed up from around the stumps, he comes forward to defend
now he gets the outside edge as he makes him come forward to defend, gets some turn to take the edge, which falls well short of slip
driven to cover
Sanga almost perishes to a harmless delivery, it was shortish and flat, Sanga went hard at the pull, and spooned it up off the top edge, it fell some way ahead from Rohit running towards mid on
cut to cover
defended outside off
too flat and too short, but a single is all he'll get with a slap to sweeper cover
some flight now, cut away to sweeper cover
to long off
to long on
pushed for a single towards midwicket
punched straight to cover
fired in flat from around the stumps, squeezed straight to point
finally he is able to punch for a single to long on
another cut finds point
tossed up ball, he adjusts as it dips to guide it towards point
too short and wide but Sanga slaps it straight to extra cover
slapped away this time to sweeper cover for one
nudged square on the leg side
low full toss pushed down to long on
pushed straight to extra cover
whipped down to long on

Sri Lanka get a boundary finally, thirimanne slog-sweeps from middle and leg, and connects well, it has landed on the rope at deep square and is ultimately signalled a six after a long look by the third umpire
dive at extra cover saves one
quicker one played out to point
turned from off through square leg
nudged wide of fine leg for two more
slapped away to sweeper cover
flighted one pushed to long off
tossed up on leg stump, eased to long on
driven to sweeper cover for another single
stays back to a flighted length ball and hits it to sweeper cover
fine stop from Jadeja at point but the backing up is not all that good at the non-striker's end as Jadeja throws, run conceded in the end

drop, a technical one, Raina would have had to be really lucky for this one to have stuck, Sanga tried to chip over the bowler but did not get it as high as he wanted to, Raina got a hand to it as he leaped in the air, but could only palm it away
neatly done, he chips in the air, between sweeper cover and long off
flicked behind square leg
an attempt to save the single at extra cover with a dive goes wrong, it is parried away towards long off, by the time he reaches the ball, they have taken two
shuffles across and works for a single through midwicket
carved with good timing but straight to point
mistimes the cut now, to point again, chops it into the ground
hmm, now he bends the knee and has a slog at this one, cannot beat midwicket
now he leaves his crease and has a heave at a length delivery, manages to get it to deep midwicket
speared in full in to the pads from around the stumps, helped along to fine leg
tight start, back of a length around middle and off, opens the face to run it to point
cannot get this one away also, pushes it out towards extra cover
he was forced to try this shot with a couple of quiet overs, charges out and lofts, mistimes it over extra cover, but it falls between sweeper cover and long off
cannot work a straightish length ball off his pads
now he nudges behind square leg, there was the opportunity for the second, but Dhoni cut it off by charging after the ball as soon as the shot was played
punches, straight to extra cover, two tight overs, more pressure on the batsmen as the Powerplay approaches
one more dot ball, as Thirimanne turns PK to midwicket
well bowled, he saw the batsman advancing and bowled it slower, Thirimanne had to adjust and could only drop it towards Dhoni for one
another stroke finds midwicket, wicket around the corner if this continues
now he leaves the crease but to no avail, India's medium-pacers working fine at the moment, Sanga is hit on the pad as he misses with the flick
bowls it quicker and fires it down the leg side
a high full toss now, patted away to long on, rate climbing all the time
full and into the pads, flicked behind square leg

Sanga picks out deep midwicket first ball of the Powerplay, and Sri Lanka have piled more pressure onto themselves, wanted to start the over with a boundary, does not get enough distance with the slog-sweep, man in the deep tumbles forward to take a fine catch, Sanga is angry at himself, screams in disappointment as he walks off
off the pad on the leg side
allows it to turn in and dabs it to short third man
played out to point

given leg-before, Ashwin has put Sri Lanka under more pressure, looks pretty straight, Thirimanne goes for the sweep, misses, Ashwin strikes the pad in front of middle with a length delivery that straightens from around the stumps, replays show that was hitting middle
more flight, dips on the left-hander who comes forward to defend
pushed down to mid on
poor line, length ball down the pads, and Tharanga tucks it fine on its way
plays back a length delivery on the right line, on middle and off
turned off the pad wide of deep square
a push that is cut off by midwicket running to his right
shortish one pulled away in front of square leg
nudged in front of square for one
plays a tossed up ball back to the bowler
Kula gets this one away, takes a few steps out, makes some room and swings it over mid off
fires in the carrom ball on a length, pushed back to the bowler
cannot get anything more than a single towards extra cover as he tries to belt it down the ground
cut to cover
swing and a miss as he comes out of the crease to have a go at a pitched up delivery that moves away a shade to beat him
got hold of this one, Vinay tries the short ball into Kula, who stands back and thumps it to the deep midwicket boundary

the slower one works for Vinay, he shouts after hitting Kula's off stump, Kula charged out again, had too much momentum to adjust as Vinay bowled it slow on a length, the ball sneaked past his swing and rattled off

ho ho, Virat Kohli can crack hundreds, he can fly and take outrageous catches like this one, Kapu lasts one ball, he reaches out to a widish ball and gets it in the air to Virat's left, there was no time to run towards it, Virat goes screaming horizontally in the air, and brings down the ball with him safely in both hands
hit on the pads with a length ball moving in, Vinay turns around and appeals, that was going easily down leg
pitched up delivery turned to midwicket
tossed up delivery pushed towards extra cover, half-stopped with a big dive by Raina, but he misses with the throw at the striker's
turned with the spin to midwicket
makes room outside leg but finds midwicket again
well done, drills a full delivery over midwicket, and into the gap between long on and deep midwicket
Maharoof lofts Ashwin over high mid off this time, it was the carrom ball, but he made some room outside leg, and went over mid off with the spin away from him, top shot
played towards midwicket
pulls a short ball through square leg
Maharoof flicks wide of fine leg but slips after completing the single
sends this length ball down the leg side with the angle
overpitched from around the stumps and shovelled straight down the ground for four
rides the bounce on this back of a length ball to pick up a single to midwicket
cannot get this one away, it moves away from him as he leaves the crease to have a go at it
direct hit and he was gone, Maharoof went for the single as Tharanga nudged to short fine
goes after the overpitched delivery, but does not get enough distance on it, it falls wide of Ashwin running to his right from long on
pulled away to deep midwicket
eased down to long off
length ball smacked down to long off
another wicket for Irfan, Tharanga goes for the drive but Irfan gets it to move in tad on a fullish length, resulting in Tharanga getting an inside edge onto the stumps,
down to long on
hit on the pads with one that moves in from a good length, height and angle, too much doubt there, replays show it would have just about touched the leg stump
length ball pushed wide of mid off
slanted wide down the leg side
comes in sharply from back of a length, and he is caught in the crease, gets an inside edge onto pad
goes after this one, manages one to mid on
goes for a widish delivery, cannot do anything with it
pushes a length ball to extra cover
driven in the air, falls short of sweeper cover
backs away outside leg, Irfan goes wide outside off, Maharoof misses
overpitched delivery drilled to extra cover
low full toss hit through midwicket, Raina runs across from long on and keeps them to one
worked through midwicket for one more
uses the angle on this length delivery to swing Vinay over midwicket, no one in the deep there
goes for the inswinging yorker, hits the front boot. but would have gone down leg
backs away before the ball has been delivered, Vinay bowls it really slow, Maharoof manages to heave it through midwicket in the end
another slower one, he has a slog at it, falls short of mid off
has another go, and misses again, they take a run as the ball dribbles off the pad towards the keeper on the off side
gone! Maharoof opened up and wanted to go down the ground, but he ended up slicing the full toss to extra cover
that will be it then, Prasanna came down the track, and swung the widish slower one off the toe end of the bat, Sachin ran back from cover and settled under it, Irfan finishes with four
